mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.area_name AS "areaName", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_area a
AND a.area_code LIKE '%'||#{areaCode}||'%' '%'+#{areaCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{areaCode}, '%')
AND a.area_name LIKE '%'||#{areaName}||'%' '%'+#{areaName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{areaName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO archive_area( area_name, area_code, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{areaName}, #{areaCode}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE archive_area SET area_name = #{areaName}, area_code = #{areaCode}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
